metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1778 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: When OTRS uses multiple backends for user authentication (with LDAP),agents are able to login even if the account is set to invalid. This issueaffects OTRS; 8.0.9 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
